edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2013.brickus.iface

Interface BrickusListener


  • public interface BrickusListener
    This interface must be implemented by any class whose objects are called when Brickus model events occur.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void illegalMove(BrickusIllegalMoveEvent event)
      Called by a model when a player attempts to make an illegal move.
      void modelChanged(BrickusEvent event)
      Called by a model when the state of the model changes.

    • Method Detail

      • modelChanged

        void modelChanged(BrickusEvent event)
        Called by a model when the state of the model changes. This change may include the contents of the board and the pieces for each player.
        Parameters:
        event - The object describing the change.

      • illegalMove

        void illegalMove(BrickusIllegalMoveEvent event)
        Called by a model when a player attempts to make an illegal move.
        Parameters:
        event - The object describing the illegal move.
